title: Whoa
body: By converting a few lines of TSQL, I just retrofitted this new .Text blog thingy back into my AIM profile.  Aren't good data models sweet?  Now I'm wondering if I should even waste any more time on the other AIM profile changes I was going to make since this .Text thing seems to be working so well on its own.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-15

Whoa

By converting a few lines of TSQL, I just retrofitted this new .Text blog thingy back into my AIM profile. Aren't good data models sweet? Now I'm wondering if I should even waste any more time on the other AIM profile changes I was going to make since this .Text thing seems to be working so well on its own.
